Name: Axial Disc 1
About the game: Follow Sai, Amara, and Oli as they fight to take on the powerful Agency! Axial features a unique turn based battle system that revolves heavily on customization and synergy to ensure your team is equipped for any challenge. With its enthralling story, unique pixel art, Game Boy themed aesthetic, and energetic chiptune soundtrack, Axial is the perfect game for fans of classic JRPGs.
